content.query:
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SP_LoadDim_Notification_Outcome_Reason]    Script Date: 12/22/2022 5:06:01 AM ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO


CREATE OR ALTER  PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_LoadDim_Notification_Outcome_Reason]
( @GetNewWaterMark bit=0,@RowValidFrom Datetime2(7)='1900-01-01 00:00:00.0000000'
)
AS

Begin 
	IF @GetNewWaterMark>0
	BEGIN
	SELECT isnull(max(RowValidFrom),@RowValidFrom) AS RowValidFrom
			FROM [dbo].[ws_notificationoutcomereason]
			WHERE CAST(RowValidFrom As datetime2(7))>@RowValidFrom
	END
	ELSE
WITH CTE AS (
	SELECT  
	[ws_notificationoutcomereasonid] AS		[NotificationOutcomeReasonID]

	,[ws_name] AS							[NotificationOutcomeReason]
	,b.LocalizedLabel AS					[Status]
   ,C.LocalizedLabel AS						[StatusReason]
	,convert(datetimeoffset,[modifiedon])as	[ModifiedDate]
	,convert(datetimeoffset,[createdon])as	[CreatedDate]
	,createdbyname as	[CreatedBy]
	,modifiedbyname		[ModifiedBy]
	,ROW_NUMBER()OVER (PARTITION BY ID Order by versionnumber DESC) AS ROW_RUM
	 ,a.RowValidFrom,a.RowValidTo,a.RowIsCurrent 
FROM [dbo].[ws_notificationoutcomereason] A
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[StateMetadata] B
		  ON A.statecode=b.State
		  AND b.EntityName='ws_notificationoutcomereason'
		  AND a.RowIsCurrent='true'
LEFT JOIN [dbo].StatusMetadata C
		  ON A.statuscode=C.Status
		  AND c.EntityName='ws_notificationoutcomereason'
		  AND a.RowIsCurrent='true'
		 -- WHERE status='Active'
	WHERE CAST(a.RowValidFrom as datetime2(7)) > @RowValidFrom)

		  SELECT 
		   --Row_NUMBER() Over (order by [NotificationOutcomeReasonID] desc)+1000 AS NotificationOutcomeReasonKey
		   [NotificationOutcomeReason]
		    ,[NotificationOutcomeReasonID]
			  FROM CTE WHERE ROW_RUM=1 and NotificationOutcomeReasonID is not null

			  UNION 

			  SELECT
			  Null,
			  'UNKNOWN'
			  END
GO
